titleStmt.title: Two congratulatory poems to Their Most Sacred Majesties the first, occasioned on the universal hopes of all loyal persons for a Prince of Wales : the second, on the happy birth of the Prince / by Mrs. A. Behn.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.

notesStmt.note: "A congratulatory poem to the Kings Most Sacred Majesty on the happy birth of the Prince of Wales" has special t.p. and separate pagination.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
